title: FDA agrees to review Modernaâ€™s mRNA flu vaccine application in a reversal
summary_full: The FDA is slated to make a decision on the flu shot on Aug. 5, which will allow Moderna to make the vaccine available for the upcoming influenza season.
summary_public: The FDA is slated to make a decision on the flu shot on Aug. 5, which will allow Moderna to make the vaccine available for the upcoming influenza season.
